'''Xander Forterie''' is a Dutch make-up artist and sculptor, who runs the Unreal studio with his business partner Rogier Samuels. They were both employed by [[Weta Workshop]] for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]]. 

Forterie worked on creature prosthetics in all three films and made several [[Sideshow Collectibles]] statuettes. He also appeared in the [[Prologue: One Ring to Rule Them All...|prologue]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' as one of the seven Dwarf lords.
